H0.text: Ursus arctos horribilis is the scientific name of which animal. Brown Bear

H1.text: Ursus arctos horribilis is the scientific name of which animal. Polar Bear

H2.text: Ursus arctos horribilis is the scientific name of which animal. Asiatic Black Bear

H3.text: Ursus arctos horribilis is the scientific name of which animal. Grizzly

A4.text: The grizzly bear (Ursus arctos horribilis), also known as the North American brown bear or simply grizzly, is a population or subspecies of the brown bear inhabiting North America.

A5.text: The genome of the grizzly bear was sequenced in 2018 and found to be 2,328.64Mb (mega-basepairs) in length, and contain 30,387 genes.
